alt_text: How To Claim Deluxe Edition Items \(1\).png
img_above_text:
![How To Claim Deluxe Edition Items \(2\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/6/66/How_To_Claim_Deluxe_Edition_Items_%282%29.png)
Along the way, you'll be encouraged to pluck a hair to unlock your first Keeper's Shrine and meet the Keeper of the Black Wind Mountain. Interact with the Shrine after the cutscene and go down to **Trailblazer's Gift** to claim your items.
img_below_text:
There will be 7 items waiting for you there including a **Weapon, Armor set, and a Curio**. If you've purchased the Deluxe Edition after passing this point, just interact with the nearest Shrine to collect your items.
## What Do You Get in the Black Myth: Wukong Deluxe Edition?

Along the way, you'll be encouraged to pluck a hair to unlock your first Keeper's Shrine and meet the Keeper of the Black Wind Mountain. Interact with the Shrine after the cutscene and go down to **Trailblazer's Gift** to claim your items."
        - Following Text: "There will be 7 items waiting for you there including a **Weapon, Armor set, and a Curio**. If you've purchased the Deluxe Edition after passing this point, just interact with the nearest Shrine to collect your items.
## What Do You Get in the Black Myth: Wukong Deluxe Edition?"

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts an in-game menu at a Keeper's Shrine in *Black Myth: Wukong*, located in the "Forest of Wolves - Front Hills." The menu offers options such as "Rest," "Travel," "Trailblazer's Gift," and "Leave." Selecting "Trailblazer's Gift" allows players to claim Deluxe Edition items, including a weapon, armor set, and curio, as described in the accompanying text. This interaction is part of the process for unlocking and collecting special edition rewards.
